title: Tips and Tricks - Die-Cast Hemisphere™ Blender 800BLXL
description: Breville's Adele Schober overviews the features and functionality of the Die-Cast Hemisphere Blender.

asset.title: Tips and Tricks - Die-Cast Hemisphere™ Blender 800BLXL

transcripts: This is the Breville die-cast Hemisphere blender and what makes our blender so unique is the hemisphere system. Our blenders just have two prongs up and two prongs down and all the food gets lost in the blender but with ours we got this block and blade system with these two extra large plates here. This are the serrated blades in the middle with the bowl. So what that does it's like a Vortex so food goes up the side of the bowl and falls onto itself.
